settings.custom_liquid:
FAQs

1. Trust & Satisfaction (Proofs, Guarantees, Design Assurance) +
Can I see a free proof or mockup before production? +
Yes! You can request a 100% free digital proof by adding a note in the comment section during checkout or replying to your confirmation email within 24 hours of placing your order.
Can I request a refund if I don’t like the proof? +
Absolutely. If the design proof doesn’t meet your expectations and you decide not to move forward, reply to your confirmation email within 24 hours and we’ll issue a full refund before production begins.
How long do I have to request design or color changes? +
You have 24 hours after placing your order to submit design or color change requests—unless included at checkout.
What happens if I don't submit design instructions? +
If you don’t provide any notes or follow-up after checkout, we will proceed with production based on your uploaded artwork and our professional design standards.
How many design variations can I request? +
You may request up to 4 design variations per rug to ensure your vision is met without slowing production.
2. Customization & Design Options +
Do you offer design assistance? +
Yes! We offer free design help for logo cleanup, layout, color guidance, and complete concept creation.
Will my design be centered and sized correctly? +
Yes. Every design is manually adjusted by our team for centering, scaling, and balance.
Can I add text, numbers, images, or multiple logos? +
Absolutely. Upload them or reply to your confirmation email and we’ll combine everything into a cohesive proof.
Can you rotate my design? +
Yes. We can rotate it in any direction. Just let us know.
3. Backgrounds, Color, & Logo Styling +
How do I choose or change the background color? +
Include your desired color in the checkout comment section or reply to your confirmation email within 24 hours with a hex code or reference image.
Can I change the background color after placing the order? +
Yes, as long as it’s requested within 24 hours.
Can I request a black or grey background with a white logo? +
Yes, this is a popular option. Just specify it during checkout or by email.
Can you invert my logo? +
Yes. Just let us know to flip light-to-dark or vice versa.
Will the colors and design match the final result? +
We target 95–100% color accuracy, but some variation can occur based on texture and screens.
4. Shapes & Sizes +
Do you offer custom shapes? +
Yes. Include your shape request at checkout or by email.
Do you offer custom sizes? +
Yes. Pick the closest listed size and tell us your real dimensions — we’ll invoice custom if needed.
5. Product Details & Quality +
What are your rugs made of? +
Durable, commercial-grade polyester with a non-slip rubber or vinyl backing.
Will the rugs stay flat in high-traffic areas? +
Yep — weight-balanced and reinforced for stability.
Are the rugs durable enough for daily use? +
Absolutely. Built for stores, gyms, and heavy traffic.
Are they easy to clean? +
Yup. Vacuum regularly, or hose down with soap if needed.
Can they be used outdoors? +
Yes — fade- and moisture-resistant, great for patios.
Do they have non-slip backing? +
Yup — every rug includes an anti-slip base.
How thick are the rugs? +
About 0.4\" (10mm) — ADA-compliant and door-safe.
6. Ordering & File Upload Help +
What file types do you accept? +
PNG, JPEG, SVG, PDF, WebP — between 200KB and 20MB (2MB+ preferred).
Can I check out without uploading my design? +
Yes. Place your order and email us the file within 24 hours.
I’m having trouble uploading—what should I do? +
Just finish checkout and send us the file later — we’ll confirm.
I can't complete checkout—what should I do? +
Refresh or try a different browser. If that fails, contact us to place it manually.
Can I cancel or modify my order after placing it? +
Yes — within 24 hours and before production begins.
7. Discounts & Bulk Orders +
My discount code isn’t working—what should I do? +
Just complete the order and mention the code — we’ll refund the difference manually.
Do you offer bulk pricing? +
Yes! For 10, 50, 100, 200+, contact us and we’ll send a quote.
8. Production, Shipping & Delivery +
What is the production and shipping turnaround time? +
Production takes 3–5 business days, then it ships express ground.
Where do you ship from? +
Orange County, California.
How do I track my order? +
We’ll email tracking when it ships. If not received, reply to your order confirmation.
